text: int main ( ) { int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , c [ 100 ] ; int n , i , j , k , m , x , p = 0 , v , t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t > 0 ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( i = 0 ; i < n - 1 ; i ++ ) { m = a [ i ] [ 0 ] + a [ i + 1 ] [ 0 ] ; k = m + a [ i + 1 ] [ 1 ] ; c [ p ] = m > k ? m : k ; p ++ ; } x = p ; v = c [ 0 ] ; for ( p = 0 ; p < x ; p ++ ) { if ( c [ p ] > v ) v = c [ p ] ; } printf ( "%d\n" , v ) ; t -- ; } return 0 ; }
